This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Test that the (x, y, z) values for CSSTranslation are correct. 
PASS Test that the is2D values for CSSTranslation is correct. 
PASS Test that toString values for CSSTranslation is correct. 
FAIL Test that CSSTranslation constructor throws when z component contains percent. assert_throws: function "function () { new CSSTranslation(simpleLength, simpleLength, simplePercent); }" did not throw
PASS Test that invalid number of arguments for CSSTranslation throws an exception. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
